title: ECT the First-Choice Treatment for Psychotic Depression
itunes:title: ECT the First-Choice Treatment for Psychotic Depression
description:
This episode discusses the use of ECT for severely ill patients, including its benefits and limitations, as well as the use of ECT as a maintenance treatment.

Faculty: David Osser, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D., Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Node 1: ECT for Severely Ill Patients
